meanings.definition: Connect to (a computer or server) using the Telnet protocol.
meanings.sent1: I telnetted into the server to check my emails.
meanings.sent2: She telnetted to the computer to troubleshoot the issue.
meanings.sent3: The cat telnetted into the laptop and accidentally sent an email.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts telnetted to a distant memory, bringing a smile to his face.
meanings.sent5: The idea of telnetting into the mainframe felt like exploring a hidden world.

meanings.definition: Accessed or logged into (a computer or server) using Telnet.
meanings.sent1: They telnetted into the system to retrieve the data.
meanings.sent2: We telnetted into the network to perform maintenance tasks.
meanings.sent3: The robot telnetted into the database and got confused by all the information.
meanings.sent4: Her mind telnetted into the past, reliving old memories.
meanings.sent5: The hacker telnetted into the secure server, bypassing all defenses.
